OTPConfirmation.Subject: Email Verification
OTPConfirmation.Message: Thank you for registering with us! To complete your email verification process, please use the One-Time Password (OTP) provided below: {Otp}.
OTPConfirmation.HtmlBody:
Email Verification

Dear {FullName},

Thank you for registering with us! To complete your email verification process, please use the One-Time Password (OTP) provided below.

{Otp}

This OTP is valid for a short period and is required to confirm your email address. Please enter it in the verification page to proceed.

If you did not request this OTP, please disregard this email. If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to contact our support team.

Thank you for choosing our service.

Best regards,

The Polaris Team

If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email or contact support.

Best regards,
